text: Vy musyte znaty shcho yakshcho vy otrymuyete budʹ-yakyy psuyetʹsya u viyni, odniy- p'yatiy budete poyikhaty do BOHA ta kur'yera, do podanykh do rodychiv, syrot, bidnykh, ta mandruyuchykh chuzhykh. Vy zrobyte tse yakshcho vy viryte v BOHU ta u shcho my vidkryly do nashoho sluzhbovtsya na dni rishennya, denʹ dva armiyi hryuknutoyi. BOH Omnipotent
